title: Captain America: Brave New World
description: Sam Wilson, the new Captain America, finds himself in the middle of an international incident and must discover the motive behind a nefarious global plan.

title: My Fault London
description: An 18-year-old girl moves from America to London with her mother and wealthy stepfather. She meets her stepbrother, and an attraction brews despite their efforts.

title: Kraven the Hunter
description: Russian immigrant Sergei Kravinoff is on a mission to prove that he is the greatest hunter in the world.

title: The Gray Man
description: Count Gentry aka, Sierra Six a highly skilled former CIA Operative, was once the agencyâ€™s best merchant of death. After his escape from prison, and recruitment by former handler Donald Fitzroy.
